shrimp.name: Stripe
shrimp.author: rconstruct

input.name: x
input.description: x is the value to be tested

output.name: out
output.description: 1 if x is in the stripe, 0 if inbetween stripes

shrimp.usage: This function generates stripes of width "width" at the given frequency "freq" for the "x" value to be tested, with "blur" controlling the antialiasing of the stripe edges.
